Klasse PlayerDTO

java.lang.Object
dto.PlayerDTO
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Serializable
public class PlayerDTO extends Object implements Serializable
A Data Transfer object (DTO) representing a player in the game.
Siehe auch:

  • Konstruktordetails

    • PlayerDTO

      public PlayerDTO(String name, List<CardDTO> hand, List<CardDTO> validMoves, int points, int winPoints)
      Constructs a new PlayerDTO instance with the given data.
      Parameter:
      name - the name of the player
      hand - the cards in the player`s hand
      validMoves - the list of cards the player can validly play.
      points - the current score of the player in this round.
      winPoints - the sum of win points across rounds

  • Methodendetails

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the player's name.
      Gibt zurück:
      the player's name

    • getHand

      public List<CardDTO> getHand()
      Gets the list of cards in the player's hand.
      Gibt zurück:
      the player's hand as a list of CardDTO

    • getPoints

      public int getPoints()
      Gets the number of points the player has earned in the current round.
      Gibt zurück:
      the player's current round points

    • getWinPoints

      public int getWinPoints()

    • getValidMoves

      public List<CardDTO> getValidMoves()
      Gets the list of cards the player is allowed to play.
      Gibt zurück:
      the valid moves as a list of CardDTO
